duties_responsibilities.duty: Plan, design, implement, and monitor security technologies and projects to support underlying security policies and procedures.
Design, document, and implement appropriate security policies and standards to protect information assets.
Assist in security reports and audit responses; conduct vulnerability assessments and provide vulnerability remediation.
Participate in the development of security policies, guidelines, best practices, and strategy.
Provide organizational & end user software support for 30% of the role.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or other IT-related degree, or equivalent work experience (certifications such as MCSE, SANS GCIH preferred).
